Interface BankProxy

  • public interface BankProxy

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long auth​(CcInfo creditCardDetails, long amount)
      A method that processes an auth request.

    • Method Detail

      • auth

        long auth​(CcInfo creditCardDetails,
          long amount)
        A method that processes an auth request.
        Parameters:
        creditCardDetails - an object representation of the card details
        amount - a long representation of the amount to charge
        Returns:
        a long representation of th transaction id

      • capture

        int capture​(long transactionId)
        A method that captures funds.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - a long representation of th transaction id
        Returns:
        an int representation of the capture status code; 0 is successful; -1 if the transaction does not exist; -2 transaction exists but already captured; -3 exists but capture period expired; -4 unknown error

      • refund

        int refund​(long transactionId,
           long amount)
        A method that requests a refund for a transaction.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - a long representation of the transaction id
        amount - a long representation of the amount to refund
        Returns:
        an int representation of the refund status
